00063 /******************************* Keymap Item **********************************
00064  * Item in a keymap, that maps from an event to an operator or modal map item */
00065 
00066 static wmKeyMapItem *wm_keymap_item_copy(wmKeyMapItem *kmi)
00067 {
00068     wmKeyMapItem *kmin = MEM_dupallocN(kmi);
00069 
00070     kmin->prev = kmin->next = NULL;
00071     kmin->flag &= ~KMI_UPDATE;
00072 
00073     if (kmin->properties) {
00074         kmin->ptr = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PointerRNA), "UserKeyMapItemPtr");
00075         WM_operator_properties_create(kmin->ptr, kmin->idname);
00076 
00077         kmin->properties = IDP_CopyProperty(kmin->properties);
00078         kmin->ptr->data = kmin->properties;
00079     }
00080 
00081     return kmin;
00082 }
00083 
00084 static void wm_keymap_item_free(wmKeyMapItem *kmi)
00085 {
00086     /* not kmi itself */
00087     if (kmi->ptr) {
00088         WM_operator_properties_free(kmi->ptr);
00089         MEM_freeN(kmi->ptr);
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 static void wm_keymap_item_properties_set(wmKeyMapItem *kmi)
00094 {
00095     WM_operator_properties_alloc(&(kmi->ptr), &(kmi->properties), kmi->idname);
00096     WM_operator_properties_sanitize(kmi->ptr, 1);
00097 }
00098 
00099 static int wm_keymap_item_equals_result(wmKeyMapItem *a, wmKeyMapItem *b)
00100 {
00101     if (strcmp(a->idname, b->idname) != 0)
00102         return 0;
00103     
00104     if (!((a->ptr == NULL && b->ptr == NULL) ||
00105           (a->ptr && b->ptr && IDP_EqualsProperties(a->ptr->data, b->ptr->data))))
00106         return 0;
00107     
00108     if ((a->flag & KMI_INACTIVE) != (b->flag & KMI_INACTIVE))
00109         return 0;
00110     
00111     return (a->propvalue == b->propvalue);
00112 }
00113 
00114 static int wm_keymap_item_equals(wmKeyMapItem *a, wmKeyMapItem *b)
00115 {
00116     return (wm_keymap_item_equals_result(a, b) &&
00117             a->type == b->type &&
00118             a->val == b->val &&
00119             a->shift == b->shift &&
00120             a->ctrl == b->ctrl &&
00121             a->alt == b->alt &&
00122             a->oskey == b->oskey &&
00123             a->keymodifier == b->keymodifier &&
00124             a->maptype == b->maptype);
00125 }
00126 
00127 /* properties can be NULL, otherwise the arg passed is used and ownership is given to the kmi */
00128 void WM_keymap_properties_reset(wmKeyMapItem *kmi, struct IDProperty *properties)
00129 {
00130     WM_operator_properties_free(kmi->ptr);
00131     MEM_freeN(kmi->ptr);
00132 
00133     kmi->ptr = NULL;
00134     kmi->properties = properties;
00135 
00136     wm_keymap_item_properties_set(kmi);
00137 }
00138 
00139 /**************************** Keymap Diff Item *********************************
00140  * Item in a diff keymap, used for saving diff of keymaps in user preferences */
00141 
00142 static wmKeyMapDiffItem *wm_keymap_diff_item_copy(wmKeyMapDiffItem *kmdi)
00143 {
00144     wmKeyMapDiffItem *kmdin = MEM_dupallocN(kmdi);
00145 
00146     kmdin->next = kmdin->prev = NULL;
00147     if (kmdi->add_item)
00148         kmdin->add_item = wm_keymap_item_copy(kmdi->add_item);
00149     if (kmdi->remove_item)
00150         kmdin->remove_item = wm_keymap_item_copy(kmdi->remove_item);
00151     
00152     return kmdin;
00153 }
00154 
00155 static void wm_keymap_diff_item_free(wmKeyMapDiffItem *kmdi)
00156 {
00157     if (kmdi->remove_item) {
00158         wm_keymap_item_free(kmdi->remove_item);
00159         MEM_freeN(kmdi->remove_item);
00160     }
00161     if (kmdi->add_item) {
00162         wm_keymap_item_free(kmdi->add_item);
00163         MEM_freeN(kmdi->add_item);
00164     }
00165 }

00167 /***************************** Key Configuration ******************************
00168  * List of keymaps for all editors, modes, ... . There is a builtin default key
00169  * configuration, a user key configuration, and other preset configurations. */
00170 
00171 wmKeyConfig *WM_keyconfig_new(wmWindowManager *wm, const char *idname)
00172 {
00173     wmKeyConfig *keyconf;
00174     
00175     keyconf = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmKeyConfig), "wmKeyConfig");
00176     BLI_strncpy(keyconf->idname, idname, sizeof(keyconf->idname));
00177     BLI_addtail(&wm->keyconfigs, keyconf);
00178 
00179     return keyconf;
00180 }
00181 
00182 wmKeyConfig *WM_keyconfig_new_user(wmWindowManager *wm, const char *idname)
00183 {
00184     wmKeyConfig *keyconf = WM_keyconfig_new(wm, idname);
00185 
00186     keyconf->flag |= KEYCONF_USER;
00187 
00188     return keyconf;
00189 }
00190 
00191 void WM_keyconfig_remove(wmWindowManager *wm, wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
00192 {
00193     if (keyconf) {
00194         if (strncmp(U.keyconfigstr, keyconf->idname, sizeof(U.keyconfigstr)) == 0) {
00195             BLI_strncpy(U.keyconfigstr, wm->defaultconf->idname, sizeof(U.keyconfigstr));
00196             WM_keyconfig_update_tag(NULL, NULL);
00197         }
00198 
00199         BLI_remlink(&wm->keyconfigs, keyconf);
00200         WM_keyconfig_free(keyconf);
00201     }
00202 }
00203 
00204 void WM_keyconfig_free(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
00205 {
00206     wmKeyMap *km;
00207 
00208     while ((km = keyconf->keymaps.first)) {
00209         WM_keymap_free(km);
00210         BLI_freelinkN(&keyconf->keymaps, km);
00211     }
00212 
00213     MEM_freeN(keyconf);
00214 }
00215 
00216 static wmKeyConfig *wm_keyconfig_list_find(ListBase *lb, char *idname)
00217 {
00218     wmKeyConfig *kc;
00219 
00220     for (kc = lb->first; kc; kc = kc->next)
00221         if (0 == strncmp(idname, kc->idname, KMAP_MAX_NAME))
00222             return kc;
00223     
00224     return NULL;
00225 }
00226 
00227 static wmKeyConfig *WM_keyconfig_active(wmWindowManager *wm)
00228 {
00229     wmKeyConfig *keyconf;
00230 
00231     /* first try from preset */
00232     keyconf = wm_keyconfig_list_find(&wm->keyconfigs, U.keyconfigstr);
00233     if (keyconf)
00234         return keyconf;
00235     
00236     /* otherwise use default */
00237     return wm->defaultconf;
00238 }
00239 
00240 void WM_keyconfig_set_active(wmWindowManager *wm, const char *idname)
00241 {
00242     /* setting a different key configuration as active: we ensure all is
00243      * updated properly before and after making the change */
00244 
00245     WM_keyconfig_update(wm);
00246 
00247     BLI_strncpy(U.keyconfigstr, idname, sizeof(U.keyconfigstr));
00248 
00249     WM_keyconfig_update_tag(NULL, NULL);
00250     WM_keyconfig_update(wm);
00251 }

00253 /********************************** Keymap *************************************
00254  * List of keymap items for one editor, mode, modal operator, ... */
00255 
00256 static wmKeyMap *wm_keymap_new(const char *idname, int spaceid, int regionid)
00257 {
00258     wmKeyMap *km = MEM_callocN(sizeof(struct wmKeyMap), "keymap list");
00259 
00260     BLI_strncpy(km->idname, idname, KMAP_MAX_NAME);
00261     km->spaceid = spaceid;
00262     km->regionid = regionid;
00263 
00264     return km;
00265 }
00266 
00267 static wmKeyMap *wm_keymap_copy(wmKeyMap *keymap)
00268 {
00269     wmKeyMap *keymapn = MEM_dupallocN(keymap);
00270     wmKeyMapItem *kmi, *kmin;
00271     wmKeyMapDiffItem *kmdi, *kmdin;
00272 
00273     keymapn->modal_items = keymap->modal_items;
00274     keymapn->poll = keymap->poll;
00275     keymapn->items.first = keymapn->items.last = NULL;
00276     keymapn->flag &= ~(KEYMAP_UPDATE | KEYMAP_EXPANDED);
00277 
00278     for (kmdi = keymap->diff_items.first; kmdi; kmdi = kmdi->next) {
00279         kmdin = wm_keymap_diff_item_copy(kmdi);
00280         BLI_addtail(&keymapn->items, kmdin);
00281     }
00282 
00283     for (kmi = keymap->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next) {
00284         kmin = wm_keymap_item_copy(kmi);
00285         BLI_addtail(&keymapn->items, kmin);
00286     }
00287 
00288     return keymapn;
00289 }
00290 
00291 void WM_keymap_free(wmKeyMap *keymap)
00292 {
00293     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00294     wmKeyMapDiffItem *kmdi;
00295 
00296     for (kmdi = keymap->diff_items.first; kmdi; kmdi = kmdi->next)
00297         wm_keymap_diff_item_free(kmdi);
00298 
00299     for (kmi = keymap->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next)
00300         wm_keymap_item_free(kmi);
00301 
00302     BLI_freelistN(&keymap->diff_items);
00303     BLI_freelistN(&keymap->items);
00304 }
00305 
00306 static void keymap_event_set(wmKeyMapItem *kmi, short type, short val, int modifier, short keymodifier)
00307 {
00308     kmi->type = type;
00309     kmi->val = val;
00310     kmi->keymodifier = keymodifier;
00311 
00312     if (modifier == KM_ANY) {
00313         kmi->shift = kmi->ctrl = kmi->alt = kmi->oskey = KM_ANY;
00314     }
00315     else {
00316         kmi->shift = (modifier & KM_SHIFT) ? KM_MOD_FIRST : ((modifier & KM_SHIFT2) ? KM_MOD_SECOND : FALSE);
00317         kmi->ctrl =  (modifier & KM_CTRL)  ? KM_MOD_FIRST : ((modifier & KM_CTRL2)  ? KM_MOD_SECOND : FALSE);
00318         kmi->alt =   (modifier & KM_ALT)   ? KM_MOD_FIRST : ((modifier & KM_ALT2)   ? KM_MOD_SECOND : FALSE);
00319         kmi->oskey = (modifier & KM_OSKEY) ? KM_MOD_FIRST : ((modifier & KM_OSKEY2) ? KM_MOD_SECOND : FALSE);
00320     }
00321 }
00322 
00323 static void keymap_item_set_id(wmKeyMap *keymap, wmKeyMapItem *kmi)
00324 {
00325     keymap->kmi_id++;
00326     if ((keymap->flag & KEYMAP_USER) == 0) {
00327         kmi->id = keymap->kmi_id;
00328     }
00329     else {
00330         kmi->id = -keymap->kmi_id; // User defined keymap entries have negative ids
00331     }
00332 }
00333 
00334 /* if item was added, then bail out */
00335 wmKeyMapItem *WM_keymap_verify_item(wmKeyMap *keymap, const char *idname, int type, int val, int modifier, int keymodifier)
00336 {
00337     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00338     
00339     for (kmi = keymap->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next)
00340         if (strncmp(kmi->idname, idname, OP_MAX_TYPENAME) == 0)
00341             break;
00342     if (kmi == NULL) {
00343         kmi = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmKeyMapItem), "keymap entry");
00344         
00345         BLI_addtail(&keymap->items, kmi);
00346         BLI_strncpy(kmi->idname, idname, OP_MAX_TYPENAME);
00347         
00348         keymap_item_set_id(keymap, kmi);
00349 
00350         keymap_event_set(kmi, type, val, modifier, keymodifier);
00351         wm_keymap_item_properties_set(kmi);
00352     }
00353     return kmi;
00354 }
00355 
00356 /* always add item */
00357 wmKeyMapItem *WM_keymap_add_item(wmKeyMap *keymap, const char *idname, int type, int val, int modifier, int keymodifier)
00358 {
00359     wmKeyMapItem *kmi = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmKeyMapItem), "keymap entry");
00360     
00361     BLI_addtail(&keymap->items, kmi);
00362     BLI_strncpy(kmi->idname, idname, OP_MAX_TYPENAME);
00363 
00364     keymap_event_set(kmi, type, val, modifier, keymodifier);
00365     wm_keymap_item_properties_set(kmi);
00366 
00367     keymap_item_set_id(keymap, kmi);
00368 
00369     WM_keyconfig_update_tag(keymap, kmi);
00370 
00371     return kmi;
00372 }
00373 
00374 /* menu wrapper for WM_keymap_add_item */
00375 wmKeyMapItem *WM_keymap_add_menu(wmKeyMap *keymap, const char *idname, int type, int val, int modifier, int keymodifier)
00376 {
00377     wmKeyMapItem *kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_call_menu", type, val, modifier, keymodifier);
00378     RNA_string_set(kmi->ptr, "name", idname);
00379     return kmi;
00380 }
00381 
00382 void WM_keymap_remove_item(wmKeyMap *keymap, wmKeyMapItem *kmi)
00383 {
00384     if (BLI_findindex(&keymap->items, kmi) != -1) {
00385         if (kmi->ptr) {
00386             WM_operator_properties_free(kmi->ptr);
00387             MEM_freeN(kmi->ptr);
00388         }
00389         BLI_freelinkN(&keymap->items, kmi);
00390 
00391         WM_keyconfig_update_tag(keymap, kmi);
00392     }
00393 }
00394 
00395 /************************** Keymap Diff and Patch ****************************
00396  * Rather than saving the entire keymap for user preferences, we only save a
00397  * diff so that changes in the defaults get synced. This system is not perfect
00398  * but works better than overriding the keymap entirely when only few items
00399  * are changed. */
00400 
00401 static void wm_keymap_addon_add(wmKeyMap *keymap, wmKeyMap *addonmap)
00402 {
00403     wmKeyMapItem *kmi, *kmin;
00404 
00405     for (kmi = addonmap->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next) {
00406         kmin = wm_keymap_item_copy(kmi);
00407         keymap_item_set_id(keymap, kmin);
00408         BLI_addhead(&keymap->items, kmin);
00409     }
00410 }
00411 
00412 static wmKeyMapItem *wm_keymap_find_item_equals(wmKeyMap *km, wmKeyMapItem *needle)
00413 {
00414     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00415 
00416     for (kmi = km->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next)
00417         if (wm_keymap_item_equals(kmi, needle))
00418             return kmi;
00419     
00420     return NULL;
00421 }
00422 
00423 static wmKeyMapItem *wm_keymap_find_item_equals_result(wmKeyMap *km, wmKeyMapItem *needle)
00424 {
00425     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00426 
00427     for (kmi = km->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next)
00428         if (wm_keymap_item_equals_result(kmi, needle))
00429             return kmi;
00430     
00431     return NULL;
00432 }
00433 
00434 static void wm_keymap_diff(wmKeyMap *diff_km, wmKeyMap *from_km, wmKeyMap *to_km, wmKeyMap *orig_km, wmKeyMap *addon_km)
00435 {
00436     wmKeyMapItem *kmi, *to_kmi, *orig_kmi;
00437     wmKeyMapDiffItem *kmdi;
00438 
00439     for (kmi = from_km->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next) {
00440         to_kmi = WM_keymap_item_find_id(to_km, kmi->id);
00441 
00442         if (!to_kmi) {
00443             /* remove item */
00444             kmdi = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmKeyMapDiffItem), "wmKeyMapDiffItem");
00445             kmdi->remove_item = wm_keymap_item_copy(kmi);
00446             BLI_addtail(&diff_km->diff_items, kmdi);
00447         }
00448         else if (to_kmi && !wm_keymap_item_equals(kmi, to_kmi)) {
00449             /* replace item */
00450             kmdi = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmKeyMapDiffItem), "wmKeyMapDiffItem");
00451             kmdi->remove_item = wm_keymap_item_copy(kmi);
00452             kmdi->add_item = wm_keymap_item_copy(to_kmi);
00453             BLI_addtail(&diff_km->diff_items, kmdi);
00454         }
00455 
00456         /* sync expanded flag back to original so we don't loose it on repatch */
00457         if (to_kmi) {
00458             orig_kmi = WM_keymap_item_find_id(orig_km, kmi->id);
00459 
00460             if (!orig_kmi)
00461                 orig_kmi = wm_keymap_find_item_equals(addon_km, kmi);
00462 
00463             if (orig_kmi) {
00464                 orig_kmi->flag &= ~KMI_EXPANDED;
00465                 orig_kmi->flag |= (to_kmi->flag & KMI_EXPANDED);
00466             }
00467         }
00468     }
00469 
00470     for (kmi = to_km->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next) {
00471         if (kmi->id < 0) {
00472             /* add item */
00473             kmdi = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmKeyMapDiffItem), "wmKeyMapDiffItem");
00474             kmdi->add_item = wm_keymap_item_copy(kmi);
00475             BLI_addtail(&diff_km->diff_items, kmdi);
00476         }
00477     }
00478 }
00479 
00480 static void wm_keymap_patch(wmKeyMap *km, wmKeyMap *diff_km)
00481 {
00482     wmKeyMapDiffItem *kmdi;
00483     wmKeyMapItem *kmi_remove, *kmi_add;
00484 
00485     for (kmdi = diff_km->diff_items.first; kmdi; kmdi = kmdi->next) {
00486         /* find item to remove */
00487         kmi_remove = NULL;
00488         if (kmdi->remove_item) {
00489             kmi_remove = wm_keymap_find_item_equals(km, kmdi->remove_item);
00490             if (!kmi_remove)
00491                 kmi_remove = wm_keymap_find_item_equals_result(km, kmdi->remove_item);
00492         }
00493 
00494         /* add item */
00495         if (kmdi->add_item) {
00496             /* only if nothing to remove or item to remove found */
00497             if (!kmdi->remove_item || kmi_remove) {
00498                 kmi_add = wm_keymap_item_copy(kmdi->add_item);
00499                 kmi_add->flag |= KMI_USER_MODIFIED;
00500 
00501                 if (kmi_remove) {
00502                     kmi_add->flag &= ~KMI_EXPANDED;
00503                     kmi_add->flag |= (kmi_remove->flag & KMI_EXPANDED);
00504                     kmi_add->id = kmi_remove->id;
00505                     BLI_insertlinkbefore(&km->items, kmi_remove, kmi_add);
00506                 }
00507                 else {
00508                     keymap_item_set_id(km, kmi_add);
00509                     BLI_addtail(&km->items, kmi_add);
00510                 }
00511             }
00512         }
00513 
00514         /* remove item */
00515         if (kmi_remove) {
00516             wm_keymap_item_free(kmi_remove);
00517             BLI_freelinkN(&km->items, kmi_remove);
00518         }
00519     }
00520 }
00521 
00522 static wmKeyMap *wm_keymap_patch_update(ListBase *lb, wmKeyMap *defaultmap, wmKeyMap *addonmap, wmKeyMap *usermap)
00523 {
00524     wmKeyMap *km;
00525     int expanded = 0;
00526 
00527     /* remove previous keymap in list, we will replace it */
00528     km = WM_keymap_list_find(lb, defaultmap->idname, defaultmap->spaceid, defaultmap->regionid);
00529     if (km) {
00530         expanded = (km->flag & (KEYMAP_EXPANDED | KEYMAP_CHILDREN_EXPANDED));
00531         WM_keymap_free(km);
00532         BLI_freelinkN(lb, km);
00533     }
00534 
00535     /* copy new keymap from an existing one */
00536     if (usermap && !(usermap->flag & KEYMAP_DIFF)) {
00537         /* for compatibiltiy with old user preferences with non-diff
00538          * keymaps we override the original entirely */
00539         wmKeyMapItem *kmi, *orig_kmi;
00540 
00541         km = wm_keymap_copy(usermap);
00542 
00543         /* try to find corresponding id's for items */
00544         for (kmi = km->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next) {
00545             orig_kmi = wm_keymap_find_item_equals(defaultmap, kmi);
00546             if (!orig_kmi)
00547                 orig_kmi = wm_keymap_find_item_equals_result(defaultmap, kmi);
00548 
00549             if (orig_kmi)
00550                 kmi->id = orig_kmi->id;
00551             else
00552                 kmi->id = -(km->kmi_id++);
00553         }
00554 
00555         km->flag |= KEYMAP_UPDATE; /* update again to create diff */
00556     }
00557     else
00558         km = wm_keymap_copy(defaultmap);
00559 
00560     /* add addon keymap items */
00561     if (addonmap)
00562         wm_keymap_addon_add(km, addonmap);
00563 
00564     /* tag as being user edited */
00565     if (usermap)
00566         km->flag |= KEYMAP_USER_MODIFIED;
00567     km->flag |= KEYMAP_USER | expanded;
00568 
00569     /* apply user changes of diff keymap */
00570     if (usermap && (usermap->flag & KEYMAP_DIFF))
00571         wm_keymap_patch(km, usermap);
00572 
00573     /* add to list */
00574     BLI_addtail(lb, km);
00575     
00576     return km;
00577 }
00578 
00579 static void wm_keymap_diff_update(ListBase *lb, wmKeyMap *defaultmap, wmKeyMap *addonmap, wmKeyMap *km)
00580 {
00581     wmKeyMap *diffmap, *prevmap, *origmap;
00582 
00583     /* create temporary default + addon keymap for diff */
00584     origmap = defaultmap;
00585 
00586     if (addonmap) {
00587         defaultmap = wm_keymap_copy(defaultmap);
00588         wm_keymap_addon_add(defaultmap, addonmap);
00589     }
00590 
00591     /* remove previous diff keymap in list, we will replace it */
00592     prevmap = WM_keymap_list_find(lb, km->idname, km->spaceid, km->regionid);
00593     if (prevmap) {
00594         WM_keymap_free(prevmap);
00595         BLI_freelinkN(lb, prevmap);
00596     }
00597 
00598     /* create diff keymap */
00599     diffmap = wm_keymap_new(km->idname, km->spaceid, km->regionid);
00600     diffmap->flag |= KEYMAP_DIFF;
00601     if (defaultmap->flag & KEYMAP_MODAL)
00602         diffmap->flag |= KEYMAP_MODAL;
00603     wm_keymap_diff(diffmap, defaultmap, km, origmap, addonmap);
00604 
00605     /* add to list if not empty */
00606     if (diffmap->diff_items.first) {
00607         BLI_addtail(lb, diffmap);
00608     }
00609     else {
00610         WM_keymap_free(diffmap);
00611         MEM_freeN(diffmap);
00612     }
00613 
00614     /* free temporary default map */
00615     if (addonmap) {
00616         WM_keymap_free(defaultmap);
00617         MEM_freeN(defaultmap);
00618     }
00619 }
00620 
00621 /* ****************** storage in WM ************ */
00622 
00623 /* name id's are for storing general or multiple keymaps, 
00624  * space/region ids are same as DNA_space_types.h */
00625 /* gets freed in wm.c */
00626 
00627 wmKeyMap *WM_keymap_list_find(ListBase *lb, const char *idname, int spaceid, int regionid)
00628 {
00629     wmKeyMap *km;
00630 
00631     for (km = lb->first; km; km = km->next)
00632         if (km->spaceid == spaceid && km->regionid == regionid)
00633             if (0 == strncmp(idname, km->idname, KMAP_MAX_NAME))
00634                 return km;
00635     
00636     return NULL;
00637 }
00638 
00639 wmKeyMap *WM_keymap_find(wmKeyConfig *keyconf, const char *idname, int spaceid, int regionid)
00640 {
00641     wmKeyMap *km = WM_keymap_list_find(&keyconf->keymaps, idname, spaceid, regionid);
00642     
00643     if (km == NULL) {
00644         km = wm_keymap_new(idname, spaceid, regionid);
00645         BLI_addtail(&keyconf->keymaps, km);
00646 
00647         WM_keyconfig_update_tag(km, NULL);
00648     }
00649     
00650     return km;
00651 }
00652 
00653 wmKeyMap *WM_keymap_find_all(const bContext *C, const char *idname, int spaceid, int regionid)
00654 {
00655     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00656 
00657     return WM_keymap_list_find(&wm->userconf->keymaps, idname, spaceid, regionid);
00658 }
00659 
00660 /* ****************** modal keymaps ************ */
00661 
00662 /* modal maps get linked to a running operator, and filter the keys before sending to modal() callback */
00663 
00664 wmKeyMap *WM_modalkeymap_add(wmKeyConfig *keyconf, const char *idname, EnumPropertyItem *items)
00665 {
00666     wmKeyMap *km = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, idname, 0, 0);
00667     km->flag |= KEYMAP_MODAL;
00668     km->modal_items = items;
00669 
00670     if (!items) {
00671         /* init modal items from default config */
00672         wmWindowManager *wm = G.main->wm.first;
00673         wmKeyMap *defaultkm = WM_keymap_list_find(&wm->defaultconf->keymaps, km->idname, 0, 0);
00674 
00675         if (defaultkm) {
00676             km->modal_items = defaultkm->modal_items;
00677             km->poll = defaultkm->poll;
00678         }
00679     }
00680     
00681     return km;
00682 }
00683 
00684 wmKeyMap *WM_modalkeymap_get(wmKeyConfig *keyconf, const char *idname)
00685 {
00686     wmKeyMap *km;
00687     
00688     for (km = keyconf->keymaps.first; km; km = km->next)
00689         if (km->flag & KEYMAP_MODAL)
00690             if (0 == strncmp(idname, km->idname, KMAP_MAX_NAME))
00691                 break;
00692     
00693     return km;
00694 }
00695 
00696 
00697 wmKeyMapItem *WM_modalkeymap_add_item(wmKeyMap *km, int type, int val, int modifier, int keymodifier, int value)
00698 {
00699     wmKeyMapItem *kmi = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmKeyMapItem), "keymap entry");
00700     
00701     BLI_addtail(&km->items, kmi);
00702     kmi->propvalue = value;
00703     
00704     keymap_event_set(kmi, type, val, modifier, keymodifier);
00705 
00706     keymap_item_set_id(km, kmi);
00707 
00708     WM_keyconfig_update_tag(km, kmi);
00709 
00710     return kmi;
00711 }
00712 
00713 wmKeyMapItem *WM_modalkeymap_add_item_str(wmKeyMap *km, int type, int val, int modifier, int keymodifier, const char *value)
00714 {
00715     wmKeyMapItem *kmi = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmKeyMapItem), "keymap entry");
00716 
00717     BLI_addtail(&km->items, kmi);
00718     BLI_strncpy(kmi->propvalue_str, value, sizeof(kmi->propvalue_str));
00719 
00720     keymap_event_set(kmi, type, val, modifier, keymodifier);
00721 
00722     keymap_item_set_id(km, kmi);
00723 
00724     WM_keyconfig_update_tag(km, kmi);
00725 
00726     return kmi;
00727 }
00728 
00729 void WM_modalkeymap_assign(wmKeyMap *km, const char *opname)
00730 {
00731     wmOperatorType *ot = WM_operatortype_find(opname, 0);
00732     
00733     if (ot)
00734         ot->modalkeymap = km;
00735     else
00736         printf("error: modalkeymap_assign, unknown operator %s\n", opname);
00737 }
00738 
00739 static void wm_user_modal_keymap_set_items(wmWindowManager *wm, wmKeyMap *km)
00740 {
00741     /* here we convert propvalue string values delayed, due to python keymaps
00742      * being created before the actual modal keymaps, so no modal_items */
00743     wmKeyMap *defaultkm;
00744     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00745     int propvalue;
00746 
00747     if (km && (km->flag & KEYMAP_MODAL) && !km->modal_items) {
00748         defaultkm = WM_keymap_list_find(&wm->defaultconf->keymaps, km->idname, 0, 0);
00749 
00750         if (!defaultkm)
00751             return;
00752 
00753         km->modal_items = defaultkm->modal_items;
00754         km->poll = defaultkm->poll;
00755 
00756         for (kmi = km->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next) {
00757             if (kmi->propvalue_str[0]) {
00758                 if (RNA_enum_value_from_id(km->modal_items, kmi->propvalue_str, &propvalue))
00759                     kmi->propvalue = propvalue;
00760                 kmi->propvalue_str[0] = '\0';
00761             }
00762         }
00763     }
00764 }
00765 
00766 /* ***************** get string from key events **************** */
00767 
00768 const char *WM_key_event_string(short type)
00769 {
00770     const char *name = NULL;
00771     if (RNA_enum_name(event_type_items, (int)type, &name))
00772         return name;
00773     
00774     return "";
00775 }
00776 
00777 char *WM_keymap_item_to_string(wmKeyMapItem *kmi, char *str, int len)
00778 {
00779     char buf[128];
00780 
00781     buf[0] = 0;
00782 
00783     if (kmi->shift == KM_ANY &&
00784         kmi->ctrl == KM_ANY &&
00785         kmi->alt == KM_ANY &&
00786         kmi->oskey == KM_ANY) {
00787 
00788         strcat(buf, "Any ");
00789     }
00790     else {
00791         if (kmi->shift)
00792             strcat(buf, "Shift ");
00793 
00794         if (kmi->ctrl)
00795             strcat(buf, "Ctrl ");
00796 
00797         if (kmi->alt)
00798             strcat(buf, "Alt ");
00799 
00800         if (kmi->oskey)
00801             strcat(buf, "Cmd ");
00802     }
00803         
00804     if (kmi->keymodifier) {
00805         strcat(buf, WM_key_event_string(kmi->keymodifier));
00806         strcat(buf, " ");
00807     }
00808 
00809     strcat(buf, WM_key_event_string(kmi->type));
00810     BLI_strncpy(str, buf, len);
00811 
00812     return str;
00813 }
00814 
00815 static wmKeyMapItem *wm_keymap_item_find_handlers(
00816     const bContext *C, ListBase *handlers, const char *opname, int UNUSED(opcontext),
00817     IDProperty *properties, int compare_props, int hotkey, wmKeyMap **keymap_r)
00818 {
00819     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00820     wmEventHandler *handler;
00821     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00822     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00823 
00824     /* find keymap item in handlers */
00825     for (handler = handlers->first; handler; handler = handler->next) {
00826         keymap = WM_keymap_active(wm, handler->keymap);
00827 
00828         if (keymap && (!keymap->poll || keymap->poll((bContext *)C))) {
00829             for (kmi = keymap->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next) {
00830                 
00831                 if (strcmp(kmi->idname, opname) == 0 && WM_key_event_string(kmi->type)[0]) {
00832                     if (hotkey)
00833                         if (!ISHOTKEY(kmi->type))
00834                             continue;
00835                     
00836                     if (compare_props) {
00837                         if (kmi->ptr && IDP_EqualsProperties(properties, kmi->ptr->data)) {
00838                             if (keymap_r) *keymap_r = keymap;
00839                             return kmi;
00840                         }
00841                     }
00842                     else {
00843                         if (keymap_r) *keymap_r = keymap;
00844                         return kmi;
00845                     }
00846                 }
00847             }
00848         }
00849     }
00850     
00851     /* ensure un-initialized keymap is never used */
00852     if (keymap_r) *keymap_r = NULL;
00853     return NULL;
00854 }
00855 
00856 static wmKeyMapItem *wm_keymap_item_find_props(
00857     const bContext *C, const char *opname, int opcontext,
00858     IDProperty *properties, int compare_props, int hotkey, wmKeyMap **keymap_r)
00859 {
00860     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00861     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00862     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00863     wmKeyMapItem *found = NULL;
00864 
00865     /* look into multiple handler lists to find the item */
00866     if (win)
00867         found = wm_keymap_item_find_handlers(C, &win->handlers, opname, opcontext, properties, compare_props, hotkey, keymap_r);
00868     
00869 
00870     if (sa && found == NULL)
00871         found = wm_keymap_item_find_handlers(C, &sa->handlers, opname, opcontext, properties, compare_props, hotkey, keymap_r);
00872 
00873     if (found == NULL) {
00874         if (ELEM(opcontext, WM_OP_EXEC_REGION_WIN, WM_OP_INVOKE_REGION_WIN)) {
00875             if (sa) {
00876                 if (!(ar && ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW))
00877                     ar = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_WINDOW);
00878                 
00879                 if (ar)
00880                     found = wm_keymap_item_find_handlers(C, &ar->handlers, opname, opcontext, properties, compare_props, hotkey, keymap_r);
00881             }
00882         }
00883         else if (ELEM(opcontext, WM_OP_EXEC_REGION_CHANNELS, WM_OP_INVOKE_REGION_CHANNELS)) {
00884             if (!(ar && ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_CHANNELS))
00885                 ar = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_CHANNELS);
00886 
00887             if (ar)
00888                 found = wm_keymap_item_find_handlers(C, &ar->handlers, opname, opcontext, properties, compare_props, hotkey, keymap_r);
00889         }
00890         else if (ELEM(opcontext, WM_OP_EXEC_REGION_PREVIEW, WM_OP_INVOKE_REGION_PREVIEW)) {
00891             if (!(ar && ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_PREVIEW))
00892                 ar = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_PREVIEW);
00893 
00894             if (ar)
00895                 found = wm_keymap_item_find_handlers(C, &ar->handlers, opname, opcontext, properties, compare_props, hotkey, keymap_r);
00896         }
00897         else {
00898             if (ar)
00899                 found = wm_keymap_item_find_handlers(C, &ar->handlers, opname, opcontext, properties, compare_props, hotkey, keymap_r);
00900         }
00901     }
00902     
00903     return found;
00904 }
00905 
00906 static wmKeyMapItem *wm_keymap_item_find(
00907     const bContext *C, const char *opname, int opcontext,
00908     IDProperty *properties, const short hotkey, const short sloppy, wmKeyMap **keymap_r)
00909 {
00910     wmKeyMapItem *found = wm_keymap_item_find_props(C, opname, opcontext, properties, 1, hotkey, keymap_r);
00911 
00912     if (!found && sloppy)
00913         found = wm_keymap_item_find_props(C, opname, opcontext, NULL, 0, hotkey, keymap_r);
00914 
00915     return found;
00916 }
00917 
00918 char *WM_key_event_operator_string(
00919     const bContext *C, const char *opname, int opcontext,
00920     IDProperty *properties, const short sloppy, char *str, int len)
00921 {
00922     wmKeyMapItem *kmi = wm_keymap_item_find(C, opname, opcontext, properties, 0, sloppy, NULL);
00923     
00924     if (kmi) {
00925         WM_keymap_item_to_string(kmi, str, len);
00926         return str;
00927     }
00928 
00929     return NULL;
00930 }
00931 
00932 int WM_key_event_operator_id(
00933     const bContext *C, const char *opname, int opcontext,
00934     IDProperty *properties, int hotkey, wmKeyMap **keymap_r)
00935 {
00936     wmKeyMapItem *kmi = wm_keymap_item_find(C, opname, opcontext, properties, hotkey, TRUE, keymap_r);
00937     
00938     if (kmi)
00939         return kmi->id;
00940     else
00941         return 0;
00942 }
00943 
00944 int WM_keymap_item_compare(wmKeyMapItem *k1, wmKeyMapItem *k2)
00945 {
00946     int k1type, k2type;
00947 
00948     if (k1->flag & KMI_INACTIVE || k2->flag & KMI_INACTIVE)
00949         return 0;
00950 
00951     /* take event mapping into account */
00952     k1type = WM_userdef_event_map(k1->type);
00953     k2type = WM_userdef_event_map(k2->type);
00954 
00955     if (k1type != KM_ANY && k2type != KM_ANY && k1type != k2type)
00956         return 0;
00957 
00958     if (k1->val != KM_ANY && k2->val != KM_ANY) {
00959         /* take click, press, release conflict into account */
00960         if (k1->val == KM_CLICK && ELEM3(k2->val, KM_PRESS, KM_RELEASE, KM_CLICK) == 0)
00961             return 0;
00962         if (k2->val == KM_CLICK && ELEM3(k1->val, KM_PRESS, KM_RELEASE, KM_CLICK) == 0)
00963             return 0;
00964         if (k1->val != k2->val)
00965             return 0;
00966     }
00967 
00968     if (k1->shift != KM_ANY && k2->shift != KM_ANY && k1->shift != k2->shift)
00969         return 0;
00970 
00971     if (k1->ctrl != KM_ANY && k2->ctrl != KM_ANY && k1->ctrl != k2->ctrl)
00972         return 0;
00973 
00974     if (k1->alt != KM_ANY && k2->alt != KM_ANY && k1->alt != k2->alt)
00975         return 0;
00976 
00977     if (k1->oskey != KM_ANY && k2->oskey != KM_ANY && k1->oskey != k2->oskey)
00978         return 0;
00979 
00980     if (k1->keymodifier != k2->keymodifier)
00981         return 0;
00982 
00983     return 1;
00984 }
00985 
00986 /************************* Update Final Configuration *************************
00987  * On load or other changes, the final user key configuration is rebuilt from
00988  * the preset, addon and user preferences keymaps. We also test if the final
00989  * configuration changed and write the changes to the user preferences. */
00990 
00991 static int WM_KEYMAP_UPDATE = 0;
00992 
00993 void WM_keyconfig_update_tag(wmKeyMap *km, wmKeyMapItem *kmi)
00994 {
00995     /* quick tag to do delayed keymap updates */
00996     WM_KEYMAP_UPDATE = 1;
00997 
00998     if (km)
00999         km->flag |= KEYMAP_UPDATE;
01000     if (kmi)
01001         kmi->flag |= KMI_UPDATE;
01002 }
01003 
01004 static int wm_keymap_test_and_clear_update(wmKeyMap *km)
01005 {
01006     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
01007     int update;
01008     
01009     update = (km->flag & KEYMAP_UPDATE);
01010     km->flag &= ~KEYMAP_UPDATE;
01011 
01012     for (kmi = km->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next) {
01013         update = update || (kmi->flag & KMI_UPDATE);
01014         kmi->flag &= ~KMI_UPDATE;
01015     }
01016     
01017     return update;
01018 }
01019 
01020 static wmKeyMap *wm_keymap_preset(wmWindowManager *wm, wmKeyMap *km)
01021 {
01022     wmKeyConfig *keyconf = WM_keyconfig_active(wm);
01023     wmKeyMap *keymap;
01024 
01025     keymap = WM_keymap_list_find(&keyconf->keymaps, km->idname, km->spaceid, km->regionid);
01026     if (!keymap)
01027         keymap = WM_keymap_list_find(&wm->defaultconf->keymaps, km->idname, km->spaceid, km->regionid);
01028 
01029     return keymap;
01030 }
01031 
01032 void WM_keyconfig_update(wmWindowManager *wm)
01033 {
01034     wmKeyMap *km, *defaultmap, *addonmap, *usermap, *kmn;
01035     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
01036     wmKeyMapDiffItem *kmdi;
01037     int compat_update = 0;
01038 
01039     if (G.background)
01040         return;
01041     if (!WM_KEYMAP_UPDATE)
01042         return;
01043     
01044     /* update operator properties for non-modal user keymaps */
01045     for (km = U.user_keymaps.first; km; km = km->next) {
01046         if ((km->flag & KEYMAP_MODAL) == 0) {
01047             for (kmdi = km->diff_items.first; kmdi; kmdi = kmdi->next) {
01048                 if (kmdi->add_item)
01049                     wm_keymap_item_properties_set(kmdi->add_item);
01050                 if (kmdi->remove_item)
01051                     wm_keymap_item_properties_set(kmdi->remove_item);
01052             }
01053 
01054             for (kmi = km->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next)
01055                 wm_keymap_item_properties_set(kmi);
01056         }
01057     }
01058 
01059     /* update U.user_keymaps with user key configuration changes */
01060     for (km = wm->userconf->keymaps.first; km; km = km->next) {
01061         /* only diff if the user keymap was modified */
01062         if (wm_keymap_test_and_clear_update(km)) {
01063             /* find keymaps */
01064             defaultmap = wm_keymap_preset(wm, km);
01065             addonmap = WM_keymap_list_find(&wm->addonconf->keymaps, km->idname, km->spaceid, km->regionid);
01066 
01067             /* diff */
01068             if (defaultmap)
01069                 wm_keymap_diff_update(&U.user_keymaps, defaultmap, addonmap, km);
01070         }
01071     }
01072 
01073     /* create user key configuration from preset + addon + user preferences */
01074     for (km = wm->defaultconf->keymaps.first; km; km = km->next) {
01075         /* find keymaps */
01076         defaultmap = wm_keymap_preset(wm, km);
01077         addonmap = WM_keymap_list_find(&wm->addonconf->keymaps, km->idname, km->spaceid, km->regionid);
01078         usermap = WM_keymap_list_find(&U.user_keymaps, km->idname, km->spaceid, km->regionid);
01079 
01080         wm_user_modal_keymap_set_items(wm, defaultmap);
01081 
01082         /* add */
01083         kmn = wm_keymap_patch_update(&wm->userconf->keymaps, defaultmap, addonmap, usermap);
01084 
01085         if (kmn) {
01086             kmn->modal_items = km->modal_items;
01087             kmn->poll = km->poll;
01088         }
01089 
01090         /* in case of old non-diff keymaps, force extra update to create diffs */
01091         compat_update = compat_update || (usermap && !(usermap->flag & KEYMAP_DIFF));
01092     }
01093 
01094     WM_KEYMAP_UPDATE = 0;
01095 
01096     if (compat_update) {
01097         WM_keyconfig_update_tag(NULL, NULL);
01098         WM_keyconfig_update(wm);
01099     }
01100 }
01101 
01102 /********************************* Event Handling *****************************
01103  * Handlers have pointers to the keymap in the default configuration. During
01104  * event handling this function is called to get the keymap from the final
01105  * configuration. */
01106 
01107 wmKeyMap *WM_keymap_active(wmWindowManager *wm, wmKeyMap *keymap)
01108 {
01109     wmKeyMap *km;
01110 
01111     if (!keymap)
01112         return NULL;
01113     
01114     /* first user defined keymaps */
01115     km = WM_keymap_list_find(&wm->userconf->keymaps, keymap->idname, keymap->spaceid, keymap->regionid);
01116 
01117     if (km)
01118         return km;
01119 
01120     return keymap;
01121 }
01122 
01123 /******************************* Keymap Editor ********************************
01124  * In the keymap editor the user key configuration is edited. */
01125 
01126 void WM_keymap_restore_item_to_default(bContext *C, wmKeyMap *keymap, wmKeyMapItem *kmi)
01127 {
01128     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
01129     wmKeyMap *defaultmap, *addonmap;
01130     wmKeyMapItem *orig;
01131 
01132     if (!keymap)
01133         return;
01134 
01135     /* construct default keymap from preset + addons */
01136     defaultmap = wm_keymap_preset(wm, keymap);
01137     addonmap = WM_keymap_list_find(&wm->addonconf->keymaps, keymap->idname, keymap->spaceid, keymap->regionid);
01138 
01139     if (addonmap) {
01140         defaultmap = wm_keymap_copy(defaultmap);
01141         wm_keymap_addon_add(defaultmap, addonmap);
01142     }
01143 
01144     /* find original item */
01145     orig = WM_keymap_item_find_id(defaultmap, kmi->id);
01146 
01147     if (orig) {
01148         /* restore to original */
01149         if (strcmp(orig->idname, kmi->idname) != 0) {
01150             BLI_strncpy(kmi->idname, orig->idname, sizeof(kmi->idname));
01151             WM_keymap_properties_reset(kmi, NULL);
01152         }
01153 
01154         if (orig->properties) {
01155             if (kmi->properties) {
01156                 IDP_FreeProperty(kmi->properties);
01157                 MEM_freeN(kmi->properties);
01158                 kmi->properties = NULL;
01159             }
01160 
01161             kmi->properties = IDP_CopyProperty(orig->properties);
01162             kmi->ptr->data = kmi->properties;
01163         }
01164 
01165         kmi->propvalue = orig->propvalue;
01166         kmi->type = orig->type;
01167         kmi->val = orig->val;
01168         kmi->shift = orig->shift;
01169         kmi->ctrl = orig->ctrl;
01170         kmi->alt = orig->alt;
01171         kmi->oskey = orig->oskey;
01172         kmi->keymodifier = orig->keymodifier;
01173         kmi->maptype = orig->maptype;
01174 
01175         WM_keyconfig_update_tag(keymap, kmi);
01176     }
01177 
01178     /* free temporary keymap */
01179     if (addonmap) {
01180         WM_keymap_free(defaultmap);
01181         MEM_freeN(defaultmap);
01182     }
01183 }
01184 
01185 void WM_keymap_restore_to_default(wmKeyMap *keymap, bContext *C)
01186 {
01187     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
01188     wmKeyMap *usermap;
01189 
01190     /* remove keymap from U.user_keymaps and update */
01191     usermap = WM_keymap_list_find(&U.user_keymaps, keymap->idname, keymap->spaceid, keymap->regionid);
01192 
01193     if (usermap) {
01194         WM_keymap_free(usermap);
01195         BLI_freelinkN(&U.user_keymaps, usermap);
01196 
01197         WM_keyconfig_update_tag(NULL, NULL);
01198         WM_keyconfig_update(wm);
01199     }
01200 }
01201 
01202 wmKeyMapItem *WM_keymap_item_find_id(wmKeyMap *keymap, int id)
01203 {
01204     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
01205     
01206     for (kmi = keymap->items.first; kmi; kmi = kmi->next) {
01207         if (kmi->id == id) {
01208             return kmi;
01209         }
01210     }
01211     
01212     return NULL;
01213 }
01214 
01215 /* Guess an appropriate keymap from the operator name */
01216 /* Needs to be kept up to date with Keymap and Operator naming */
01217 wmKeyMap *WM_keymap_guess_opname(const bContext *C, const char *opname)
01218 {
01219     wmKeyMap *km = NULL;
01220     SpaceLink *sl = CTX_wm_space_data(C);
01221     
01222     /* Window */
01223     if (strstr(opname, "WM_OT")) {
01224         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Window", 0, 0);
01225     }
01226     /* Screen */
01227     else if (strstr(opname, "SCREEN_OT")) {
01228         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Screen", 0, 0);
01229     }
01230     /* Grease Pencil */
01231     else if (strstr(opname, "GPENCIL_OT")) {
01232         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Grease Pencil", 0, 0);
01233     }
01234     /* Markers */
01235     else if (strstr(opname, "MARKER_OT")) {
01236         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Markers", 0, 0);
01237     }
01238     /* Import/Export*/
01239     else if (strstr(opname, "IMPORT_") || strstr(opname, "EXPORT_")) {
01240         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Window", 0, 0);
01241     }
01242     
01243     
01244     /* 3D View */
01245     else if (strstr(opname, "VIEW3D_OT")) {
01246         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "3D View", sl->spacetype, 0);
01247     }
01248     else if (strstr(opname, "OBJECT_OT")) {
01249         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Object Mode", 0, 0);
01250     }
01251 
01252     
01253     /* Editing Modes */
01254     else if (strstr(opname, "MESH_OT")) {
01255         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Mesh", 0, 0);
01256         
01257         /* some mesh operators are active in object mode too, like add-prim */
01258         if (km && km->poll && km->poll((bContext *)C) == 0) {
01259             km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Object Mode", 0, 0);
01260         }
01261     }
01262     else if (strstr(opname, "CURVE_OT")) {
01263         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Curve", 0, 0);
01264         
01265         /* some curve operators are active in object mode too, like add-prim */
01266         if (km && km->poll && km->poll((bContext *)C) == 0) {
01267             km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Object Mode", 0, 0);
01268         }
01269     }
01270     else if (strstr(opname, "ARMATURE_OT")) {
01271         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Armature", 0, 0);
01272     }
01273     else if (strstr(opname, "POSE_OT")) {
01274         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Pose", 0, 0);
01275     }
01276     else if (strstr(opname, "SCULPT_OT")) {
01277         switch (CTX_data_mode_enum(C)) {
01278             case OB_MODE_SCULPT:
01279                 km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Sculpt", 0, 0);
01280                 break;
01281             case OB_MODE_EDIT:
01282                 km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "UV Sculpt", 0, 0);
01283                 break;
01284         }
01285     }
01286     else if (strstr(opname, "MBALL_OT")) {
01287         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Metaball", 0, 0);
01288         
01289         /* some mball operators are active in object mode too, like add-prim */
01290         if (km && km->poll && km->poll((bContext *)C) == 0) {
01291             km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Object Mode", 0, 0);
01292         }
01293     }
01294     else if (strstr(opname, "LATTICE_OT")) {
01295         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Lattice", 0, 0);
01296     }
01297     else if (strstr(opname, "PARTICLE_OT")) {
01298         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Particle", 0, 0);
01299     }
01300     else if (strstr(opname, "FONT_OT")) {
01301         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Font", 0, 0);
01302     }
01303     else if (strstr(opname, "PAINT_OT")) {
01304         
01305         /* check for relevant mode */
01306         switch (CTX_data_mode_enum(C)) {
01307             case OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT:
01308                 km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Weight Paint", 0, 0);
01309                 break;
01310             case OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT:
01311                 km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Vertex Paint", 0, 0);
01312                 break;
01313             case OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT:
01314                 km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Image Paint", 0, 0);
01315                 break;
01316         }
01317     }
01318     /* Paint Face Mask */
01319     else if (strstr(opname, "PAINT_OT_face_select")) {
01320         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Face Mask", sl->spacetype, 0);
01321     }
01322     /* Timeline */
01323     else if (strstr(opname, "TIME_OT")) {
01324         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Timeline", sl->spacetype, 0);
01325     }
01326     /* Image Editor */
01327     else if (strstr(opname, "IMAGE_OT")) {
01328         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Image", sl->spacetype, 0);
01329     }
01330     /* UV Editor */
01331     else if (strstr(opname, "UV_OT")) {
01332         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "UV Editor", sl->spacetype, 0);
01333     }
01334     /* Node Editor */
01335     else if (strstr(opname, "NODE_OT")) {
01336         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Node Editor", sl->spacetype, 0);
01337     }
01338     /* Animation Editor Channels */
01339     else if (strstr(opname, "ANIM_OT_channels")) {
01340         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Animation Channels", sl->spacetype, 0);
01341     }
01342     /* Animation Generic - after channels */
01343     else if (strstr(opname, "ANIM_OT")) {
01344         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Animation", 0, 0);
01345     }
01346     /* Graph Editor */
01347     else if (strstr(opname, "GRAPH_OT")) {
01348         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Graph Editor", sl->spacetype, 0);
01349     }
01350     /* Dopesheet Editor */
01351     else if (strstr(opname, "ACTION_OT")) {
01352         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Dopesheet", sl->spacetype, 0);
01353     }
01354     /* NLA Editor */
01355     else if (strstr(opname, "NLA_OT")) {
01356         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "NLA Editor", sl->spacetype, 0);
01357     }
01358     /* Script */
01359     else if (strstr(opname, "SCRIPT_OT")) {
01360         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Script", sl->spacetype, 0);
01361     }
01362     /* Text */
01363     else if (strstr(opname, "TEXT_OT")) {
01364         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Text", sl->spacetype, 0);
01365     }
01366     /* Sequencer */
01367     else if (strstr(opname, "SEQUENCER_OT")) {
01368         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Sequencer", sl->spacetype, 0);
01369     }
01370     /* Console */
01371     else if (strstr(opname, "CONSOLE_OT")) {
01372         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Console", sl->spacetype, 0);
01373     }
01374     /* Console */
01375     else if (strstr(opname, "INFO_OT")) {
01376         km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Info", sl->spacetype, 0);
01377     }
01378     
01379     /* Transform */
01380     else if (strstr(opname, "TRANSFORM_OT")) {
01381         
01382         /* check for relevant editor */
01383         switch (sl->spacetype) {
01384             case SPACE_VIEW3D:
01385                 km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "3D View", sl->spacetype, 0);
01386                 break;
01387             case SPACE_IPO:
01388                 km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Graph Editor", sl->spacetype, 0);
01389                 break;
01390             case SPACE_ACTION:
01391                 km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Dopesheet", sl->spacetype, 0);
01392                 break;
01393             case SPACE_NLA:
01394                 km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "NLA Editor", sl->spacetype, 0);
01395                 break;
01396             case SPACE_IMAGE:
01397                 km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "UV Editor", sl->spacetype, 0);
01398                 break;
01399             case SPACE_NODE:
01400                 km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Node Editor", sl->spacetype, 0);
01401                 break;
01402             case SPACE_SEQ:
01403                 km = WM_keymap_find_all(C, "Sequencer", sl->spacetype, 0);
01404                 break;
01405         }
01406     }
01407     
01408     return km;
01409 }
